hh3cEponMibObjects.name: hh3cEponMibObjects
hh3cEponMibObjects.contactinfo: Platform Team H3C Technologies Co., Ltd. Hai-Dian District Beijing P.R. China http://www.h3c.com Zip: 100085
hh3cEponMibObjects.description: The objects in this MIB module are used to manage and display current configuration of Ethernet Passive Optical Network (EPON) port which are based on the Ethernet in the First Mile (EFM) Passive Optical Network(PON) as defined in IEEE Draft P802.3ah/D3.0 clause 60, 64, 65..

hh3cEponAutoAuthorize.name: hh3cEponAutoAuthorize
hh3cEponAutoAuthorize.description: This value determines whether software performs self-authorization for each Optical Network Unit(ONU) registering to the network. Setting it to false means for every ONU registering, software requires external authorization, and until it's done the ONU is not authenticated. True value means software authorizes each ONU registering to the network automatically. true - ONUs are always authorized. false - If 802.1x authorization is enable, the ONUs have to be authorized by the protocol. - If 802.1x authorization is disable, ONUs are always authorized.

hh3cEponMonitorCycle.name: hh3cEponMonitorCycle
hh3cEponMonitorCycle.description: The cycle of alarm thresholds checking. Applying to the following types: Bit Error Rate(BER) alarm, Frame Error Rate(FER), Logical Link Identity(LLID) mismatch alarm and so on. The unit is second.

hh3cEponMsgTimeOut.name: hh3cEponMsgTimeOut
hh3cEponMsgTimeOut.description: Timeout waiting for a response from Optical Line Terminal(OLT) firmware after sending it a message. The unit is millisecond.

hh3cEponMsgLoseNum.name: hh3cEponMsgLoseNum
hh3cEponMsgLoseNum.description: The times of messages sending timeouts, after which OLT will reset (applying to every OLT).

hh3cEponSysHasEPONBoard.name: hh3cEponSysHasEPONBoard
hh3cEponSysHasEPONBoard.description: true(1) - At least an EPON board exists. false(2) - No EPON board exists.

hh3cEponMonitorCycleEnable.name: hh3cEponMonitorCycleEnable
hh3cEponMonitorCycleEnable.description: Stop or continue monitoring. true(1) - Continue monitoring. false(2) - Stop monitoring.

hh3cEponOltSoftwareErrAlmEnable.name: hh3cEponOltSoftwareErrAlmEnable
hh3cEponOltSoftwareErrAlmEnable.description: Software error alarm behavior of all active OLTs. true(1) - alarm enable. false(2) - alarm disable.

hh3cEponPortLoopBackAlmEnable.name: hh3cEponPortLoopBackAlmEnable
hh3cEponPortLoopBackAlmEnable.description: LoopBack alarm behavior of EPON ports. true(1) - alarm enable. false(2) - alarm disable.

hh3cEponMonitorCycleMinVal.name: hh3cEponMonitorCycleMinVal
hh3cEponMonitorCycleMinVal.description: The lower limit of cycle which be confined to the hh3cEponMonitorCycle.

hh3cEponMonitorCycleMaxVal.name: hh3cEponMonitorCycleMaxVal
hh3cEponMonitorCycleMaxVal.description: The upper limit of cycle which be confined to the hh3cEponMonitorCycle.

hh3cEponMsgTimeOutMinVal.name: hh3cEponMsgTimeOutMinVal
hh3cEponMsgTimeOutMinVal.description: The lower limit of timeout which be confined to the hh3cEponMsgTimeOut.

hh3cEponMsgTimeOutMaxVal.name: hh3cEponMsgTimeOutMaxVal
hh3cEponMsgTimeOutMaxVal.description: The upper limit of timeout which be confined to the hh3cEponMsgTimeOut.

hh3cEponMsgLoseNumMinVal.name: hh3cEponMsgLoseNumMinVal
hh3cEponMsgLoseNumMinVal.description: The lower limit of time which be confined to the hh3cEponMsgLoseNum.

hh3cEponMsgLoseNumMaxVal.name: hh3cEponMsgLoseNumMaxVal
hh3cEponMsgLoseNumMaxVal.description: The upper limit of time which be confined to the hh3cEponMsgLoseNum.

hh3cEponSysManTable.name: hh3cEponSysManTable
hh3cEponSysManTable.description: This table defines system related parameters.

hh3cEponSysManEntry.name: hh3cEponSysManEntry
hh3cEponSysManEntry.description: The entry of the table hh3cEponSysManTable.

hh3cEponSlotIndex.name: hh3cEponSlotIndex
hh3cEponSlotIndex.description: Slot Index, the index of hh3cEponSysManTable.

hh3cEponModeSwitch.name: hh3cEponModeSwitch
hh3cEponModeSwitch.description: cmode - epon standard mode. hmode - private mode.

hh3cEponAutomaticMode.name: hh3cEponAutomaticMode
hh3cEponAutomaticMode.description: Automatic mode setting: when enabled - after new OLT is added, the OLT stack sets its encryption mode to 'triple churning' and configure the OLT to authorize ONU MAC addresses according to its table. enable -enable automatic mode. disable -disable automatic mode.

hh3cEponOamDiscoveryTimeout.name: hh3cEponOamDiscoveryTimeout
hh3cEponOamDiscoveryTimeout.description: Time out parameter for extended OAM discovery process message, ranging from 0 to 2550, measured in 100 milliseconds.

hh3cEponEncryptionNoReplyTimeOut.name: hh3cEponEncryptionNoReplyTimeOut
hh3cEponEncryptionNoReplyTimeOut.description: Encryption response timeout, ranging from 1 to 2550, measured in 100 milliseconds.

hh3cEponEncryptionUpdateTime.name: hh3cEponEncryptionUpdateTime
hh3cEponEncryptionUpdateTime.description: Encryption key update timer for all ONUs on slot, indicated by hh3cEponSlotIndex, ranging from 1 to 255, measured in seconds.

hh3cEponAutoBindStatus.name: hh3cEponAutoBindStatus
hh3cEponAutoBindStatus.description: enable - auto bind ONU ID when the ONU registered in the EPON system. disable - need manual bind ONU ID when the ONU registered in the EPON system.

hh3cEponAutoUpdateTable.name: hh3cEponAutoUpdateTable
hh3cEponAutoUpdateTable.description: EPON auto update ONU application configuration.

hh3cEponAutoUpdateEntry.name: hh3cEponAutoUpdateEntry
hh3cEponAutoUpdateEntry.description: The entry of the table hh3cEponAutoUpdateTable.

hh3cEponAutoUpdateFileName.name: hh3cEponAutoUpdateFileName
hh3cEponAutoUpdateFileName.description: The name of ONU application file, the file name must be valid and include the path. It is a zero length string by default.

hh3cEponAutoUpdateSchedStatus.name: hh3cEponAutoUpdateSchedStatus
hh3cEponAutoUpdateSchedStatus.description: The status of schedule update configuration. The hh3cEponAutoUpdateFileName must be set before enable hh3cEponAutoUpdateSchedStatus. enable - enable ONU schedule update. disable - disable ONU schedule update.

hh3cEponAutoUpdateSchedTime.name: hh3cEponAutoUpdateSchedTime
hh3cEponAutoUpdateSchedTime.description: The schedule update timing configuration is related to the hh3cEponAutoUpdateSchedType. auto update daily: the string format is hhmm auto update weekly: the string format is hhmmw 'w' means update weekly, it ranges from 0 to 6: 0 - Sunday. 1 - Monday. 2 - Tuesday. 3 - Wednesday. 4 - Thursday. 5 - Friday. 6 - Saturday. auto update in coming date : the string format is hhmmyyyymmdd. The configuration will take effect only if hh3cEponAutoUpdateSchedStatus is enabled.

hh3cEponAutoUpdateSchedType.name: hh3cEponAutoUpdateSchedType
hh3cEponAutoUpdateSchedType.description: The update type of auto updating configuration. daily - update ONU application every day. weekly - update ONU application every week. comingdate - update ONU application on coming date.

hh3cEponAutoUpdateRealTimeStatus.name: hh3cEponAutoUpdateRealTimeStatus
hh3cEponAutoUpdateRealTimeStatus.description: The status of real time update configuration. The hh3cEponAutoUpdateFileName must be set before enable hh3cEponAutoUpdateRealTimeStatus. enable - enable ONU real time update. disable - disable ONU real time update.

hh3cEponOuiIndexNextEntry.name: hh3cEponOuiIndexNextEntry
hh3cEponOuiIndexNextEntry.description: The entry of the table hh3cEponOuiIndexNextTable.

hh3cEponOuiIndexNext.name: hh3cEponOuiIndexNext
hh3cEponOuiIndexNext.description: This object contains an appropriate value to be used for hh3cEponOuiIndex when creating rows in the hh3cEponOuiTable.

hh3cEponOuiTable.name: hh3cEponOuiTable
hh3cEponOuiTable.description: List of OUI and OAM supported by OLT.

hh3cEponOuiEntry.name: hh3cEponOuiEntry
hh3cEponOuiEntry.description: The entry of the table hh3cEponOuiTable.

hh3cEponOuiValue.name: hh3cEponOuiValue
hh3cEponOuiValue.description: OUI list supported by the extended OAM discovery process. The OUI is composed of six octets. The first six octets denote the first OUI , the second six octets denote the second OUI, and the like.

hh3cEponOamVersion.name: hh3cEponOamVersion
hh3cEponOamVersion.description: Version of OAM protocol defined by the organization denoted by OUI.

hh3cEponOuiRowStatus.name: hh3cEponOuiRowStatus
hh3cEponOuiRowStatus.description: The status of this table entry. Only active, createAndGo and the destory are supported.

hh3cEponMulticastControlEntry.name: hh3cEponMulticastControlEntry
hh3cEponMulticastControlEntry.description: The entry of the table hh3cEponMulticastControlTable.

hh3cEponMulticastAddressList.name: hh3cEponMulticastAddressList
hh3cEponMulticastAddressList.description: The multicast address, each four octets represents a multicast address, the address section ranging from the first four octets to the second four octets, and the like.

hh3cEponMulticastStatus.name: hh3cEponMulticastStatus
hh3cEponMulticastStatus.description: The status of this table entry. Only active, createAndGo and the destory are supported.

hh3cEponDbaUpdateFileName.name: hh3cEponDbaUpdateFileName
hh3cEponDbaUpdateFileName.description: The name of a binary file which is loaded to the OLT from an external source. Note that the filename must contain the file path.

hh3cEponOnuUpdateFileName.name: hh3cEponOnuUpdateFileName
hh3cEponOnuUpdateFileName.description: The filename of the ONU firmware to be updated. Note that the filename must contain the file path.

hh3cOltSysManTable.name: hh3cOltSysManTable
hh3cOltSysManTable.description: This table defines several OLT system parameters: (1)laser on time (2)laser off time (3)whether multiple copy broadcast (4)whether discard packet (5)self test (6)self test result

hh3cOltSysManEntry.name: hh3cOltSysManEntry
hh3cOltSysManEntry.description: The entry of the table hh3cOltSysManTable.

hh3cOltLaserOnTime.name: hh3cOltLaserOnTime
hh3cOltLaserOnTime.description: The laser on time of the ONUs during the discovery process, measured in Time Quanta(TQ).

hh3cOltLaserOffTime.name: hh3cOltLaserOffTime
hh3cOltLaserOffTime.description: The laser off time of the ONUs during the discovery process, measured in TQ.

hh3cOltMultiCopyBrdCast.name: hh3cOltMultiCopyBrdCast
hh3cOltMultiCopyBrdCast.description: true/false filtering of tagged multicast frames. The software avert tagged downstream frames with multicast or broadcast DA to the PON and not to the CPU, except for special multicast frames (link-constraint, IGMP control and ARP) that are passed to the CPU regardless of this feature.

hh3cOltEnableDiscardPacket.name: hh3cOltEnableDiscardPacket
hh3cOltEnableDiscardPacket.description: Forward(false)/discard(true) any frames received from unlearned source address when the inside address table of the original ONU entry reach to the limit.

hh3cOltSelfTest.name: hh3cOltSelfTest
hh3cOltSelfTest.description: selftest(1): Test OLT to check whether it's OK.

hh3cOltSelfTestResult.name: hh3cOltSelfTestResult
hh3cOltSelfTestResult.description: The self test result of the specific OLT. other(1): The self test result is another reason. ok(2): The self test result is OK. fail(3): The self test result is fail.

hh3cOltMaxRtt.name: hh3cOltMaxRtt
hh3cOltMaxRtt.description: Set the max Round Trip Time of this OLT.

hh3cOltInfoTable.name: hh3cOltInfoTable
hh3cOltInfoTable.description: Primary status of the specified OLT. There will be one row in this table for each information in the system. (1)Software and hardware versions of the specified OLT (hh3cOltFirmMajorVersion, hh3cOltFirmMinorVersion, hh3cOltHardMajorVersion, hh3cOltHardMinorVersion) (2)Several physical capabilities of an OLT device. (hh3cOltAgcLockTime, hh3cOltAgcCdrTime) (3)The operation(activation) status of an OLT. (hh3cOltMacAddress, hh3cOltWorkMode)

hh3cOltInfoEntry.name: hh3cOltInfoEntry
hh3cOltInfoEntry.description: The entry of the table hh3cOltInfoTable.

hh3cOltFirmMajorVersion.name: hh3cOltFirmMajorVersion
hh3cOltFirmMajorVersion.description: OLT firmware major version. If the object length is zero, it means the version is unknown.

hh3cOltFirmMinorVersion.name: hh3cOltFirmMinorVersion
hh3cOltFirmMinorVersion.description: OLT firmware minor version. If the object length is zero, it means the version is unknown.

hh3cOltHardMajorVersion.name: hh3cOltHardMajorVersion
hh3cOltHardMajorVersion.description: OLT hardware major version. If the object length is zero, it means the version is unknown.

hh3cOltHardMinorVersion.name: hh3cOltHardMinorVersion
hh3cOltHardMinorVersion.description: OLT hardware minor version. If the object length is zero, it means the version is unknown.

hh3cOltAgcLockTime.name: hh3cOltAgcLockTime
hh3cOltAgcLockTime.description: PON upstream data Automatic Gain Control(AGC) lock time, measured in TQ, range: 1 - 2^15. 0x7FFFFFFF: unknown value.

hh3cOltAgcCdrTime.name: hh3cOltAgcCdrTime
hh3cOltAgcCdrTime.description: PON RX signal synchronization time, measured in TQ, range: 1 - 2^15. 0x7FFFFFFF: unknown value

hh3cOltWorkMode.name: hh3cOltWorkMode
hh3cOltWorkMode.description: The operation(activation) modes of an OLT. other(1) - The OLT is in another mode. open(2) - The OLT is open. reset(3) - The OLT is reset. closed(4) - The OLT is closed.

hh3cOltOpticalPowerTx.name: hh3cOltOpticalPowerTx
hh3cOltOpticalPowerTx.description: The optical power transmitted by this OLT. It measured in 0.01 dBm unit.

hh3cOltOpticalPowerRx.name: hh3cOltOpticalPowerRx
hh3cOltOpticalPowerRx.description: The burst optical power received by this OLT. It measured in 0.01 dBm unit.

hh3cOltDbaManTable.name: hh3cOltDbaManTable
hh3cOltDbaManTable.description: This table defines the primary parameters of the Dynamic Bandwidth Allocation(DBA) algorithm applying to the OLT.

hh3cOltDbaManEntry.name: hh3cOltDbaManEntry
hh3cOltDbaManEntry.description: The entry of the table hh3cOltDbaManTable.

hh3cOltDbaEnabledType.name: hh3cOltDbaEnabledType
hh3cOltDbaEnabledType.description: Enable different types of the DBA algorithm. Start upstream dynamic bandwidth allocation algorithm, replacing former bandwidth allocation mechanism. internal(1) - OLT internal Service Level Agreement(SLA) based algorithm, always being activated. external(2) - DBA algorithm in a binary file which is loaded to the OLT from an external source.

hh3cOltDbaDiscovryFrequency.name: hh3cOltDbaDiscovryFrequency
hh3cOltDbaDiscovryFrequency.description: How often should the OLT send discovery frames to the ONUs, measured in grant cycles.

hh3cOltDbaCycleLength.name: hh3cOltDbaCycleLength
hh3cOltDbaCycleLength.description: The grant cycle length in TQ units.

hh3cOltDbaUpdate.name: hh3cOltDbaUpdate
hh3cOltDbaUpdate.description: Update(1): Update the DBA algorithm with a binary file which is loaded to the OLT from an external source(flash). Config the MIB object module hh3cEponDbaUpdateFileName.

hh3cOltDbaUpdateResult.name: hh3cOltDbaUpdateResult
hh3cOltDbaUpdateResult.description: The latest DBA update result. other: The DBA update result is another reason. ok: The DBA update result is OK. fail: The DBA update result is fail. fileNotExist: The DBA update failed because the file does not exist. notSetFilename: The DBA filename is not set.

hh3cOltPortAlarmThresholdTable.name: hh3cOltPortAlarmThresholdTable
hh3cOltPortAlarmThresholdTable.description: The table defines the alarm threshold of OLT.

hh3cOltPortAlarmThresholdEntry.name: hh3cOltPortAlarmThresholdEntry
hh3cOltPortAlarmThresholdEntry.description: The entry of the table hh3cOltPortAlarmThresholdTable.

hh3cOltPortAlarmBerEnabled.name: hh3cOltPortAlarmBerEnabled
hh3cOltPortAlarmBerEnabled.description: Behavior of BER alarm. true(1) - alarm enable. false(2) - alarm disable.

hh3cOltPortAlarmBerDirect.name: hh3cOltPortAlarmBerDirect
hh3cOltPortAlarmBerDirect.description: Traffic direction to monitor for BER alarm.

hh3cOltPortAlarmBerThreshold.name: hh3cOltPortAlarmBerThreshold
hh3cOltPortAlarmBerThreshold.description: BER threshold exceed which the alarm is raised.

hh3cOltPortAlarmFerEnabled.name: hh3cOltPortAlarmFerEnabled
hh3cOltPortAlarmFerEnabled.description: Behavior of FER alarm. true(1) - alarm enable. false(2) - alarm disable.

hh3cOltPortAlarmFerDirect.name: hh3cOltPortAlarmFerDirect
hh3cOltPortAlarmFerDirect.description: Traffic direction to monitor for FER alarm.

hh3cOltPortAlarmFerThreshold.name: hh3cOltPortAlarmFerThreshold
hh3cOltPortAlarmFerThreshold.description: Frame error rate exceed threshold then the alarm is raised.

hh3cOltPortAlarmLlidMismatchEnabled.name: hh3cOltPortAlarmLlidMismatchEnabled
hh3cOltPortAlarmLlidMismatchEnabled.description: Behavior of LLID mismatch alarm. true(1) - alarm enable. false(2) - alarm disable.

hh3cOltPortAlarmLlidMismatchThreshold.name: hh3cOltPortAlarmLlidMismatchThreshold
hh3cOltPortAlarmLlidMismatchThreshold.description: The minimal number of mismatched frames exceed threshold then LLID mismatch alarm is raised.

hh3cOltPortAlarmRemoteStableEnabled.name: hh3cOltPortAlarmRemoteStableEnabled
hh3cOltPortAlarmRemoteStableEnabled.description: Behavior of remote stable alarm. true(1) - alarm enable. false(2) - alarm disable.

hh3cOltPortAlarmLocalStableEnabled.name: hh3cOltPortAlarmLocalStableEnabled
hh3cOltPortAlarmLocalStableEnabled.description: Behavior of local stable alarm. true(1) - alarm enable. false(2) - alarm disable.

hh3cOltPortAlarmRegistrationEnabled.name: hh3cOltPortAlarmRegistrationEnabled
hh3cOltPortAlarmRegistrationEnabled.description: Behavior of registration alarm. true(1) - alarm enable. false(2) - alarm disable.

hh3cOltPortAlarmOamDisconnectionEnabled.name: hh3cOltPortAlarmOamDisconnectionEnabled
hh3cOltPortAlarmOamDisconnectionEnabled.description: Behavior of Operations Administration and Maintenance(OAM) disconnection alarm. true(1) - alarm enable. false(2) - alarm disable.

hh3cOltPortAlarmEncryptionKeyEnabled.name: hh3cOltPortAlarmEncryptionKeyEnabled
hh3cOltPortAlarmEncryptionKeyEnabled.description: Behavior of encryption bad key alarm. true(1) - alarm enable. false(2) - alarm disable.

hh3cOltPortAlarmVendorSpecificEnabled.name: hh3cOltPortAlarmVendorSpecificEnabled
hh3cOltPortAlarmVendorSpecificEnabled.description: Behavior of vendor specific alarm. true(1) - alarm enable. false(2) - alarm disable.

hh3cOltPortAlarmRegExcessEnabled.name: hh3cOltPortAlarmRegExcessEnabled
hh3cOltPortAlarmRegExcessEnabled.description: Behavior of ONU registering over limitation alarm. true(1) - alarm enable. false(2) - alarm disable.

hh3cOltPortAlarmDFEEnabled.name: hh3cOltPortAlarmDFEEnabled
hh3cOltPortAlarmDFEEnabled.description: Behavior of device fatal error alarm. true - alarm enable. false - alarm disable.

hh3cOltLaserOnTimeMinVal.name: hh3cOltLaserOnTimeMinVal
hh3cOltLaserOnTimeMinVal.description: The lower limit of time which is confined to hh3cOltLaserOnTime.

hh3cOltLaserOnTimeMaxVal.name: hh3cOltLaserOnTimeMaxVal
hh3cOltLaserOnTimeMaxVal.description: The upper limit of time which is confined to hh3cOltLaserOnTime.

hh3cOltLaserOffTimeMinVal.name: hh3cOltLaserOffTimeMinVal
hh3cOltLaserOffTimeMinVal.description: The lower limit of time which is confined to hh3cOltLaserOffTime.

hh3cOltLaserOffTimeMaxVal.name: hh3cOltLaserOffTimeMaxVal
hh3cOltLaserOffTimeMaxVal.description: The upper limit of time which is confined to hh3cOltLaserOffTime.

hh3cOltDbaDiscoveryLengthMinVal.name: hh3cOltDbaDiscoveryLengthMinVal
hh3cOltDbaDiscoveryLengthMinVal.description: The lower limit of the discovery length which is confined to hh3cOltDbaDiscoveryLength.

hh3cOltDbaDiscoveryLengthMaxVal.name: hh3cOltDbaDiscoveryLengthMaxVal
hh3cOltDbaDiscoveryLengthMaxVal.description: The upper limit of the discovery length which is confined to hh3cOltDbaDiscoveryLength.

hh3cOltDbaDiscovryFrequencyMinVal.name: hh3cOltDbaDiscovryFrequencyMinVal
hh3cOltDbaDiscovryFrequencyMinVal.description: The lower limit of the discovery length which is confined to hh3cOltDbaDiscovryFrequency.

hh3cOltDbaDiscovryFrequencyMaxVal.name: hh3cOltDbaDiscovryFrequencyMaxVal
hh3cOltDbaDiscovryFrequencyMaxVal.description: The upper limit of the discovery length which is confined to hh3cOltDbaDiscovryFrequency.

hh3cOltDbaCycleLengthMinVal.name: hh3cOltDbaCycleLengthMinVal
hh3cOltDbaCycleLengthMinVal.description: The lower limit of the frames which is confined to hh3cOltDbaCycleLength.

hh3cOltDbaCycleLengthMaxVal.name: hh3cOltDbaCycleLengthMaxVal
hh3cOltDbaCycleLengthMaxVal.description: The upper limit of the frames which is confined to hh3cOltDbaCycleLength.

hh3cOltPortAlarmLlidMisMinVal.name: hh3cOltPortAlarmLlidMisMinVal
hh3cOltPortAlarmLlidMisMinVal.description: The lower limit of the frames which is confined to hh3cOltPortAlarmLlidMismatchThreshold.

hh3cOltPortAlarmLlidMisMaxVal.name: hh3cOltPortAlarmLlidMisMaxVal
hh3cOltPortAlarmLlidMisMaxVal.description: The upper limit of the frames which is confined to hh3cOltPortAlarmLlidMismatchThreshold.

hh3cOltPortAlarmBerMinVal.name: hh3cOltPortAlarmBerMinVal
hh3cOltPortAlarmBerMinVal.description: The lower limit of threshold which is confined to hh3cOltPortAlarmBerThreshold.

hh3cOltPortAlarmBerMaxVal.name: hh3cOltPortAlarmBerMaxVal
hh3cOltPortAlarmBerMaxVal.description: The upper limit of threshold which is confined to hh3cOltPortAlarmBerThreshold.

hh3cOltPortAlarmFerMinVal.name: hh3cOltPortAlarmFerMinVal
hh3cOltPortAlarmFerMinVal.description: The lower limit of threshold which is confined to hh3cOltPortAlarmFerThreshold.

hh3cOltPortAlarmFerMaxVal.name: hh3cOltPortAlarmFerMaxVal
hh3cOltPortAlarmFerMaxVal.description: The upper limit of threshold which is confined to hh3cOltPortAlarmFerThreshold.

hh3cOnuSilentTable.name: hh3cOnuSilentTable
hh3cOnuSilentTable.description: This table is used for getting silent ONU information of OLT.

hh3cOnuSilentEntry.name: hh3cOnuSilentEntry
hh3cOnuSilentEntry.description: The entry of the table hh3cOnuSilentTable.

hh3cOnuSilentMacAddr.name: hh3cOnuSilentMacAddr
hh3cOnuSilentMacAddr.description: The MAC address of silent ONUs in OLT.

hh3cOnuSilentTime.name: hh3cOnuSilentTime
hh3cOnuSilentTime.description: The aging time of a silent ONU.

hh3cOltUsingOnuTable.name: hh3cOltUsingOnuTable
hh3cOltUsingOnuTable.description: The table containing configurations to manage ONU interface(s) based on OLT interface.

hh3cOltUsingOnuEntry.name: hh3cOltUsingOnuEntry
hh3cOltUsingOnuEntry.description: The entry of the table hh3cOltUsingOnuTable.

hh3cOltUsingOnuNum.name: hh3cOltUsingOnuNum
hh3cOltUsingOnuNum.description: The ONU interface number. This value is used to specify the ONU interface which the user wants to configure for an OLT interface.

hh3cOltUsingOnuIfIndex.name: hh3cOltUsingOnuIfIndex
hh3cOltUsingOnuIfIndex.description: The ifIndex of the ONU interface.

hh3cOltUsingOnuRowStatus.name: hh3cOltUsingOnuRowStatus
hh3cOltUsingOnuRowStatus.description: This object is responsible for managing the creation, deletion and modification of rows, which supports active status and CreatAndGo, destroy operation.

hh3cOnuSysManTable.name: hh3cOnuSysManTable
hh3cOnuSysManTable.description: This table implements the following functions for ONUs: 1. Encrypting all downstream/upstream and downstream directions traffic destined to and originated from a specific LLID (ONU in current implementation). 2. Restart a process of ONU authentication, using the OLT (IEEE 802.1x) authenticator.

hh3cOnuSysManEntry.name: hh3cOnuSysManEntry
hh3cOnuSysManEntry.description: The entry of the table hh3cOnuSysManTable.

hh3cOnuEncryptMan.name: hh3cOnuEncryptMan
hh3cOnuEncryptMan.description: Start encrypting all downstream/upstream and downstream directions traffic destined to and originated from a specific LLID (ONU in current implementation). ONU registration encryption key is used as an initial value. If the encryption key was updated after ONU registration, the last updated key is used. off(1): - Stop encrypting. downlink(2): - Start encrypting all downstream directions traffic. updownlink(3): - Start encrypting all downstream/upstream directions traffic.

hh3cOnuReAuthorize.name: hh3cOnuReAuthorize
hh3cOnuReAuthorize.description: Restart a process of ONU authentication. If 802.1x authentication is enabled, the OLT (IEEE 802.1x) authenticator is applied. Otherwise, use the default authentication. Until the reauthentication succeeds, the ONU remains its previous authorization mode. The reauthentication process includes a new authentication request sent to the authentication server.

hh3cOnuMulticastFilterStatus.name: hh3cOnuMulticastFilterStatus
hh3cOnuMulticastFilterStatus.description: true(1) - Multicast-Filter enable on ONU. false(2) - Multicast-Filter disable on ONU.

hh3cOnuDbaReportQueueSetNumber.name: hh3cOnuDbaReportQueueSetNumber
hh3cOnuDbaReportQueueSetNumber.description: The number of queue sets reported in MPCP report frames.

hh3cOnuRemoteFecStatus.name: hh3cOnuRemoteFecStatus
hh3cOnuRemoteFecStatus.description: Value that indicates status of the 1000BASE-PX PHY optional FEC Sublayer for forward error correction see [802.3ah] clause 65.2. enable - enable remote forward error correction. disable - disable remote forward error correction.

hh3cOnuPortBerStatus.name: hh3cOnuPortBerStatus
hh3cOnuPortBerStatus.description: enable - enable ONU port bit error rate alarm. disable - disable ONU port bit error rate alarm.

hh3cOnuMulticastControlMode.name: hh3cOnuMulticastControlMode
hh3cOnuMulticastControlMode.description: igmpsnooping - the traditional IGMP snooping mode. multicastcontrol - the specific multicast control mode.

hh3cOnuAccessVlan.name: hh3cOnuAccessVlan
hh3cOnuAccessVlan.description: The VLAN ID assigned to untagged frames received on ONU.

hh3cOnuEncryptKey.name: hh3cOnuEncryptKey
hh3cOnuEncryptKey.description: The encryption key, used to encrypt all downstream traffic destined to and/or upstream traffic originating from a specific ONU. It is a zero length, or MD5 hashed string, by default, the string is empty.

hh3cOnuUniUpDownTrapStatus.name: hh3cOnuUniUpDownTrapStatus
hh3cOnuUniUpDownTrapStatus.description: true - A notification will be sent when UNI link status is change. false - Device will not sent notification when UNI link status is change.

hh3cOnuFecStatus.name: hh3cOnuFecStatus
hh3cOnuFecStatus.description: Value that indicates status of the 1000BASE-PX PHY optional FEC Sublayer for forward error correction (include remote onu and local OLT) see [802.3ah] clause 65.2 enable - enable forward error correction. disable - disable forward error correction.

hh3cOnuMcastCtrlHostAgingTime.name: hh3cOnuMcastCtrlHostAgingTime
hh3cOnuMcastCtrlHostAgingTime.description: The host aging time of multicast control mode on ONU, ranging from 200 to 1000, measured in seconds.

hh3cOnuMulticastFastLeaveEnable.name: hh3cOnuMulticastFastLeaveEnable
hh3cOnuMulticastFastLeaveEnable.description: true(1) - Enable multicast fast leave attribute on all ethernet UNIs of the ONU. false(2) - Disable multicast fast leave attribute on all ethernet UNIs of the ONU.

hh3cOnuPortIsolateEnable.name: hh3cOnuPortIsolateEnable
hh3cOnuPortIsolateEnable.description: true(1) - Enable port isolate setting on all ethernet UNIs of the ONU. false(2) - Disable port isolate setting on all ethernet UNIs of the ONU.

hh3cOnuLinkTestTable.name: hh3cOnuLinkTestTable
hh3cOnuLinkTestTable.description: LLID link test applying to the ONU only including delay measurement option. The command tests a link to a single LLID over a period of time or once, using a variable number of measurement frames. The length of the measurement frames is also parameterized. The test uses a loopback mode of the ONU to return each measurement frame, loopback activation is done using randomly patterned OAM Protocol Data Unit(PDU) frames.

hh3cOnuLinkTestFrameSize.name: hh3cOnuLinkTestFrameSize
hh3cOnuLinkTestFrameSize.description: Measurement frames data size, measured in bytes. Not including Preamble, SFD, VLAN tag, and FCS. Frame size minimum value is 56 - if VLAN tag is enabled('VLAN enable' field is set to ENABLE), and 60 - if VLAN tag is disabled. The actual measurement frames sent to the PON are always minimum 60 bytes long. When VLAN tag is enabled, the actual measurement frames size including FCS may reach (1514+4+4=)1522 bytes. 60(60 is VLAN tag disabled) - 1514 .

hh3cOnuLinkTestDelay.name: hh3cOnuLinkTestDelay
hh3cOnuLinkTestDelay.description: true:Link test includes delay measurement, which corresponds to the difference between sent and received times(including granting delay and firmware processing time overheads). false:Link test not includes a delay measurement.

hh3cOnuLinkTestVlanTag.name: hh3cOnuLinkTestVlanTag
hh3cOnuLinkTestVlanTag.description: true:Enable VLAN tag in link test frames. false:Link test not includes frames with VLAN tag.

hh3cOnuLinkTestResultSentFrameNum.name: hh3cOnuLinkTestResultSentFrameNum
hh3cOnuLinkTestResultSentFrameNum.description: The total number of frames sent during the link test process.

hh3cOnuLinkTestResultRetFrameNum.name: hh3cOnuLinkTestResultRetFrameNum
hh3cOnuLinkTestResultRetFrameNum.description: The total number of frames return back during the link test process.

hh3cOnuLinkTestResultRetErrFrameNum.name: hh3cOnuLinkTestResultRetErrFrameNum
hh3cOnuLinkTestResultRetErrFrameNum.description: The total number of error frames return back during the link test process.

hh3cOnuLinkTestResultMinDelay.name: hh3cOnuLinkTestResultMinDelay
hh3cOnuLinkTestResultMinDelay.description: The minimum delay time in TQ units, which corresponds to the difference between sent and received times (including granting delay and firmware processing time overheads). It's invalid if the field 'hh3cOnuLinkTestDelay' is set to be true.

hh3cOnuLinkTestResultMeanDelay.name: hh3cOnuLinkTestResultMeanDelay
hh3cOnuLinkTestResultMeanDelay.description: The average delay time in TQ units, which corresponds to the difference between sent and received times (including granting delay and firmware processing time overheads). It's invalid if the field 'hh3cOnuLinkTestDelay' is set to be true.

hh3cOnuLinkTestResultMaxDelay.name: hh3cOnuLinkTestResultMaxDelay
hh3cOnuLinkTestResultMaxDelay.description: The maximum delay time in TQ units, which corresponds to the difference between sent and received times (including granting delay and firmware processing time overheads). It's invalid if the field 'hh3cOnuLinkTestDelay' is set to be true.

hh3cOnuBandWidthTable.name: hh3cOnuBandWidthTable
hh3cOnuBandWidthTable.description: Set bandwidth policy parameters(restrictions)for a LLID (only for the ONU). Default policies are set to disable. Policy parameters will be erased upon LLID network disconnection.

hh3cOnuDownStreamBandWidthPolicy.name: hh3cOnuDownStreamBandWidthPolicy
hh3cOnuDownStreamBandWidthPolicy.description: true:Enable static bandwidth configuration policing. false:Disable static bandwidth configuration policing.

hh3cOnuDownStreamMaxBandWidth.name: hh3cOnuDownStreamMaxBandWidth
hh3cOnuDownStreamMaxBandWidth.description: Maximum bandwidth allowed for the ONU, measured in Kbits/Sec.

hh3cOnuDownStreamMaxBurstSize.name: hh3cOnuDownStreamMaxBurstSize
hh3cOnuDownStreamMaxBurstSize.description: Maximal number of bytes in a burst. The value is truncated to the nearest smaller 128 bytes multiple value, measured in bytes.

hh3cOnuDownStreamHighPriorityFirst.name: hh3cOnuDownStreamHighPriorityFirst
hh3cOnuDownStreamHighPriorityFirst.description: true:Enable high priority frames preference. false:Disable high priority frames preference.

hh3cOnuDownStreamShortFrameFirst.name: hh3cOnuDownStreamShortFrameFirst
hh3cOnuDownStreamShortFrameFirst.description: true:Enable short frames preference. false:Disable short frames preference.

hh3cOnuP2PBandWidthPolicy.name: hh3cOnuP2PBandWidthPolicy
hh3cOnuP2PBandWidthPolicy.description: true:Enable static bandwidth configuration policing. false:Disable static bandwidth configuration policing.

hh3cOnuP2PMaxBandWidth.name: hh3cOnuP2PMaxBandWidth
hh3cOnuP2PMaxBandWidth.description: Maximum bandwidth allowed for the ONU, measured in Kbits/Sec.

hh3cOnuP2PMaxBurstSize.name: hh3cOnuP2PMaxBurstSize
hh3cOnuP2PMaxBurstSize.description: Maximal number of bytes in a burst. The value is truncated to the nearest smaller 128 bytes multiple value, measured in bytes.

hh3cOnuP2PHighPriorityFirst.name: hh3cOnuP2PHighPriorityFirst
hh3cOnuP2PHighPriorityFirst.description: true:Enable high priority frames preference. false:Disable high priority frames preference.

hh3cOnuP2PShortFrameFirst.name: hh3cOnuP2PShortFrameFirst
hh3cOnuP2PShortFrameFirst.description: true:Enable short frames preference. false:Disable short frames preference.

hh3cOnuSlaManTable.name: hh3cOnuSlaManTable
hh3cOnuSlaManTable.description: Two types of DBA algorithm are supported in the ONU. The internal SLA based algorithm is always activated. This table defines the primary parameter about the internal SLA algorithm.

hh3cOnuSlaMaxBandWidth.name: hh3cOnuSlaMaxBandWidth
hh3cOnuSlaMaxBandWidth.description: Maximum bandwidth - measured in Kbit/s. The value of this object should be the multiple of the value of hh3cOnuSlaBandWidthStepVal. The minimum bandwidth should not be larger than the maximum bandwidth.

hh3cOnuSlaMinBandWidth.name: hh3cOnuSlaMinBandWidth
hh3cOnuSlaMinBandWidth.description: Minimum bandwidth - measured in Kbit/s. The value of this object should be the multiple of the value of hh3cOnuSlaBandWidthStepVal. The maximum bandwidth should be larger than the minimum bandwidth.

hh3cOnuSlaBandWidthStepVal.name: hh3cOnuSlaBandWidthStepVal
hh3cOnuSlaBandWidthStepVal.description: Granularity of bandwidth - measured in Kbit/s. The value of hh3cOnuSlaMaxBandWidth and hh3cOnuSlaMinBandWidth should be the multiple of the value of this object.

hh3cOnuSlaDelay.name: hh3cOnuSlaDelay
hh3cOnuSlaDelay.description: low - low delay. high - high delay. The delay constraint of a specific ONU. Set to high may improve the bandwidth usage at the cost of delay.

hh3cOnuSlaFixedBandWidth.name: hh3cOnuSlaFixedBandWidth
hh3cOnuSlaFixedBandWidth.description: Fixed bandwidth - measured in Kbit/s. The value of this object should be the multiple of the value of hh3cOnuSlaBandWidthStepVal.

hh3cOnuSlaPriorityClass.name: hh3cOnuSlaPriorityClass
hh3cOnuSlaPriorityClass.description: Precedence of this flow over others in case of contention. 0 is the lowest priority and 7 is the highest priority.

hh3cOnuSlaFixedPacketSize.name: hh3cOnuSlaFixedPacketSize
hh3cOnuSlaFixedPacketSize.description: Fixed packet size - measured in byte. The value of this object should be valid when hh3cOnuSlaFixedBandWidth is configured.

hh3cOnuInfoTable.name: hh3cOnuInfoTable
hh3cOnuInfoTable.description: Primary status of the specified ONU. There will be one row in this table for each information in the system. (1)Software and hardware versions of the specified ONU (hh3cOnuHardMajorVersion, hh3cOnuHardMinorVersion, hh3cOnuUniMacType) (2)Several physical capabilities of the ONU. (hh3cOnuLaserOnTime, hh3cOnuLaserOffTime, hh3cOnuGrantFifoDep.) (3)The operation(activation) status of the ONU. (hh3cOnuWorkMode)

hh3cOnuHardMajorVersion.name: hh3cOnuHardMajorVersion
hh3cOnuHardMajorVersion.description: ONU hardware major version. If the object length is zero, it means the version is unknown.

hh3cOnuHardMinorVersion.name: hh3cOnuHardMinorVersion
hh3cOnuHardMinorVersion.description: ONU hardware minor version. If the object length is zero, it means the version is unknown.

hh3cOnuUniMacType.name: hh3cOnuUniMacType
hh3cOnuUniMacType.description: ONU User Network Interface(UNI) port MAC type.

hh3cOnuLaserOnTime.name: hh3cOnuLaserOnTime
hh3cOnuLaserOnTime.description: The ONU laser on time measured in TQ units. If the object value is 0x7FFFFFFF, it means hh3cOnuLaserOnTime is unknown.

hh3cOnuLaserOffTime.name: hh3cOnuLaserOffTime
hh3cOnuLaserOffTime.description: The ONU laser off time measured in TQ units. If the object value is 0x7FFFFFFF, it means hh3cOnuLaserOffTime is unknown.

hh3cOnuGrantFifoDep.name: hh3cOnuGrantFifoDep
hh3cOnuGrantFifoDep.description: Maximal number of grant records an ONU can store, relevant to ONU only. range: 1 - 255. 0x7FFFFFFF: unknown value.

hh3cOnuWorkMode.name: hh3cOnuWorkMode
hh3cOnuWorkMode.description: The operation(activation) mode of an ONU. other(1) - ONU is in another mode. on(2) - ONU is registered and authorized to the network. In this mode it works as a media converter. pending(3) - ONU has been registered to the PON, but not authorized to the network. off(4) - ONU is not registered to the network.

hh3cOnuDistance.name: hh3cOnuDistance
hh3cOnuDistance.description: The distance between OLT and ONU, measured in meter.

hh3cOnuLlid.name: hh3cOnuLlid
hh3cOnuLlid.description: The link layer identifier, which uniquely identifies the ONU of a specific OLT.

hh3cOnuOpticalPowerReceivedByOlt.name: hh3cOnuOpticalPowerReceivedByOlt
hh3cOnuOpticalPowerReceivedByOlt.description: The burst ONU optical power received by OLT, and when the ONU status is up the value is usable. It measured in 0.01 dBm unit.

hh3cOnuMacAddrInfoTable.name: hh3cOnuMacAddrInfoTable
hh3cOnuMacAddrInfoTable.description: This table used for getting MAC address information of ONU.

hh3cOnuMacIndex.name: hh3cOnuMacIndex
hh3cOnuMacIndex.description: The index of ONUs in one OLT.

hh3cOnuMacAddrFlag.name: hh3cOnuMacAddrFlag
hh3cOnuMacAddrFlag.description: The flag of ONU status. 1 - bound:The ONU is bound but not registered. 2 - registered:The ONU is registered but not bound. 3 - run:The ONU is registered and bound on one OLT. 4 - regIncorrect:The ONU is bound on one OLT and registered on another OLT.

hh3cOnuBindMacAddrTable.name: hh3cOnuBindMacAddrTable
hh3cOnuBindMacAddrTable.description: This table implements the following functions for ONUs: Bind MAC of ONU.

hh3cOnuBindMacAddrEntry.name: hh3cOnuBindMacAddrEntry
hh3cOnuBindMacAddrEntry.description: The entry of the table hh3cOnuBindMacAddrTable.

hh3cOnuBindMacAddress.name: hh3cOnuBindMacAddress
hh3cOnuBindMacAddress.description: Bind the MAC of ONU. While the MAC is not bound, the ONU can not go into effect and configurations can not be set. Set 0-0-0 (MAC address) to the EPON device port will unbind the relationship with the original MAC and configurations will be set to default values.

hh3cOnuBindType.name: hh3cOnuBindType
hh3cOnuBindType.description: Set the binding type with the ONU which is confined to the index of hh3cEponOnuTypeDescr.

hh3cOnuFirmwareUpdateTable.name: hh3cOnuFirmwareUpdateTable
hh3cOnuFirmwareUpdateTable.description: This table implements the following functions for ONUs: 1. Update the ONU firmware. 2. Result of update ONU firmware.

hh3cOnuFirmwareUpdateEntry.name: hh3cOnuFirmwareUpdateEntry
hh3cOnuFirmwareUpdateEntry.description: The entry of the table hh3cOnuFirmwareUpdateTable.

hh3cOnuUpdate.name: hh3cOnuUpdate
hh3cOnuUpdate.description: update(1): Update the ONU firmware. Config the MIB object module hh3cEponOnuUpdateFileName with the filename of ONU firmware first.

hh3cOnuUpdateResult.name: hh3cOnuUpdateResult
hh3cOnuUpdateResult.description: The ONU firmware update result. updating - The ONU is updating firmware right now. ok - The ONU update result is OK. fail - The ONU update result is fail. fileNotExist - The ONU update failed because the file does not exist. notSetFilename - The ONU firmware filename is not set. fileNotMatchONU - The ONU firmware does not match the ONU. timeout - The ONU responses timeout. otherError - The ONU update result is unknown.

hh3cOnuUpdateFileName.name: hh3cOnuUpdateFileName
hh3cOnuUpdateFileName.description: The filename of the ONU firmware to be updated. Note that the filename must contain the file path.

hh3cOnuLinkTestFrameNumMinVal.name: hh3cOnuLinkTestFrameNumMinVal
hh3cOnuLinkTestFrameNumMinVal.description: The lower limit of measurement frames which is confined to hh3cOnuLinkTestFrameNum.

hh3cOnuLinkTestFrameNumMaxVal.name: hh3cOnuLinkTestFrameNumMaxVal
hh3cOnuLinkTestFrameNumMaxVal.description: The upper limit of measurement frames which is confined to hh3cOnuLinkTestFrameNum.

hh3cOnuSlaMaxBandWidthMinVal.name: hh3cOnuSlaMaxBandWidthMinVal
hh3cOnuSlaMaxBandWidthMinVal.description: The lower limit of maximum-bandwidth which is confined to hh3cOnuSlaMaxBandWidth.

hh3cOnuSlaMaxBandWidthMaxVal.name: hh3cOnuSlaMaxBandWidthMaxVal
hh3cOnuSlaMaxBandWidthMaxVal.description: The upper limit of maximum-bandwidth which is confined to hh3cOnuSlaMaxBandWidth.

hh3cOnuSlaMinBandWidthMinVal.name: hh3cOnuSlaMinBandWidthMinVal
hh3cOnuSlaMinBandWidthMinVal.description: The lower limit of minimum-bandwidth which is confined to hh3cOnuSlaMinBandWidth.

hh3cOnuSlaMinBandWidthMaxVal.name: hh3cOnuSlaMinBandWidthMaxVal
hh3cOnuSlaMinBandWidthMaxVal.description: The upper limit of minimum-bandwidth which is confined to hh3cOnuSlaMinBandWidth.

hh3cEponOnuTypeManTable.name: hh3cEponOnuTypeManTable
hh3cEponOnuTypeManTable.description: This table is used for getting ONU bind type in current version.

hh3cEponOnuTypeDescr.name: hh3cEponOnuTypeDescr
hh3cEponOnuTypeDescr.description: The ONU type description which can be used to bind ONU in current version. the value of hh3cOnuBindType can be configured by the index of hh3cEponOnuTypeDescr.

hh3cOnuPacketManTable.name: hh3cOnuPacketManTable
hh3cOnuPacketManTable.description: This table implements the following functions: (1)Manage packet priority trust mode. (2)Manage packet queue-scheduler mode.

hh3cOnuPriorityTrust.name: hh3cOnuPriorityTrust
hh3cOnuPriorityTrust.description: The QOS mode which is assigned on ONU. dscp - The service dscp of politic Priority. ipprecedence - The service IP precedence of politic Priority. cos - The service cos of politic Priority.

hh3cOnuQueueScheduler.name: hh3cOnuQueueScheduler
hh3cOnuQueueScheduler.description: The packet queue-scheduler mode which is assigned on ONU. spq - strict priority queuing. wfq - specifies the weights for weighted round-robin queuing.

hh3cOnuProtocolTable.name: hh3cOnuProtocolTable
hh3cOnuProtocolTable.description: This table implements the following functions: (1)Manage STP status. (2)Manage IGMP-snooping. (3)Manage DHCP-snooping.

hh3cOnuStpStatus.name: hh3cOnuStpStatus
hh3cOnuStpStatus.description: true(1) - STP status enable on ONU. false(2) - STP status disable on ONU.

hh3cOnuIgmpSnoopingStatus.name: hh3cOnuIgmpSnoopingStatus
hh3cOnuIgmpSnoopingStatus.description: true(1) - IGMP snooping status enable on ONU. false(2) - IGMP snooping status disable on ONU.

hh3cOnuDhcpsnoopingOption82.name: hh3cOnuDhcpsnoopingOption82
hh3cOnuDhcpsnoopingOption82.description: true(1) - DHCP snooping Option 82 status enable on ONU. false(2) - DHCP snooping Option 82 status disable on ONU.

hh3cOnuDhcpsnooping.name: hh3cOnuDhcpsnooping
hh3cOnuDhcpsnooping.description: true(1) - DHCP snooping status enable on ONU. false(2) - DHCP snooping status disable on ONU.

hh3cOnuPppoe.name: hh3cOnuPppoe
hh3cOnuPppoe.description: true(1) - PPPOE status enable on ONU. false(2) - PPPOE status disable on ONU.

hh3cOnuIgmpSnoopingHostAgingT.name: hh3cOnuIgmpSnoopingHostAgingT
hh3cOnuIgmpSnoopingHostAgingT.description: Set the host aging time of IGMP on ONU.

hh3cOnuIgmpSnoopingMaxRespT.name: hh3cOnuIgmpSnoopingMaxRespT
hh3cOnuIgmpSnoopingMaxRespT.description: Set the max response time of IGMP on ONU.

hh3cOnuIgmpSnoopingRouterAgingT.name: hh3cOnuIgmpSnoopingRouterAgingT
hh3cOnuIgmpSnoopingRouterAgingT.description: Set the router aging time of IGMP on ONU.

hh3cOnuIgmpSnoopingAggReportS.name: hh3cOnuIgmpSnoopingAggReportS
hh3cOnuIgmpSnoopingAggReportS.description: true(1) - Igmp snooping aggregation report status enable on ONU. false(2) - Igmp snooping aggregation report status disable on ONU.

hh3cOnuIgmpSnoopingAggLeaveS.name: hh3cOnuIgmpSnoopingAggLeaveS
hh3cOnuIgmpSnoopingAggLeaveS.description: true(1) - Igmp snooping aggregation leave status enable on ONU. false(2) - Igmp snooping aggregation leave status disable on ONU.

hh3cOnuDot1xTable.name: hh3cOnuDot1xTable
hh3cOnuDot1xTable.description: This table implements the following functions: (1)Manage 802.1x account. (2)Manage 802.1x password. ONU will be authorized to send and receive frames when the account and the password are all right, otherwise this ONU will be unavailable.

hh3cOnuDot1xAccount.name: hh3cOnuDot1xAccount
hh3cOnuDot1xAccount.description: ONU 802.1X account. The object value cannot be set as 'a', 'al' or 'all'. The object should be set together with hh3cOnuDot1xPassword.

hh3cOnuDot1xPassword.name: hh3cOnuDot1xPassword
hh3cOnuDot1xPassword.description: ONU 802.1X password. The object should be set together with hh3cOnuDot1xAccount.

hh3cOnuPriorityQueueTable.name: hh3cOnuPriorityQueueTable
hh3cOnuPriorityQueueTable.description: This table contains specific information of priority queue.

hh3cOnuQueueId.name: hh3cOnuQueueId
hh3cOnuQueueId.description: The queue ID of priority queue.

hh3cOnuQueueSize.name: hh3cOnuQueueSize
hh3cOnuQueueSize.description: The size of priority queue, measured in percent. The total length of all priority queues is a constant, by default, it is assigned to all of the priority queues evenly. The length of each priority queue may be changed by changing the value of hh3cOnuPriorityQueueSize. The total size of the inbound or outbound priority queues should be not more than 100.

hh3cOnuCountTable.name: hh3cOnuCountTable
hh3cOnuCountTable.description: This table contains statistics of ONU port.

hh3cOnuInCRCErrPkts.name: hh3cOnuInCRCErrPkts
hh3cOnuInCRCErrPkts.description: The total number of frames received with bad CRC checksum.

hh3cOnuOutDroppedFrames.name: hh3cOnuOutDroppedFrames
hh3cOnuOutDroppedFrames.description: The total number of frames dropped because of buffer failure.

hh3cOnuPriorityQueueSizeMinVal.name: hh3cOnuPriorityQueueSizeMinVal
hh3cOnuPriorityQueueSizeMinVal.description: The lower limit of queue size which is confined to hh3cOnuQueueSize.

hh3cOnuPriorityQueueSizeMaxVal.name: hh3cOnuPriorityQueueSizeMaxVal
hh3cOnuPriorityQueueSizeMaxVal.description: The upper limit of queue size which is confined to hh3cOnuQueueSize.

hh3cOnuUpdateByTypeNextIndex.name: hh3cOnuUpdateByTypeNextIndex
hh3cOnuUpdateByTypeNextIndex.description: Offer a free index of hh3cOnuFirmwareUpdateByTypeTable.

hh3cOnuQueueBandwidthTable.name: hh3cOnuQueueBandwidthTable
hh3cOnuQueueBandwidthTable.description: This table contains specific bandwidth information of ONU priority queue.

hh3cOnuQueueMaxBandwidth.name: hh3cOnuQueueMaxBandwidth
hh3cOnuQueueMaxBandwidth.description: The maximum bandwidth of specific ONU priority queue, measured in 100Kbps.

hh3cOnuQueueMaxBurstsize.name: hh3cOnuQueueMaxBurstsize
hh3cOnuQueueMaxBurstsize.description: The maximum burst size of specific ONU priority queue, measured in 64Bytes.

hh3cOnuQueuePolicyStatus.name: hh3cOnuQueuePolicyStatus
hh3cOnuQueuePolicyStatus.description: true - enable bandwidth policy false - disable bandwidth policy The bandwidth administrative status of specific ONU priority queue.

hh3cOnuIpAddress.name: hh3cOnuIpAddress
hh3cOnuIpAddress.description: The IP address assigned to the ONU.

hh3cOnuIpAddressMask.name: hh3cOnuIpAddressMask
hh3cOnuIpAddressMask.description: The mask of IP address denoted by hh3cOnuIpAddress.

hh3cOnuIpAddressGateway.name: hh3cOnuIpAddressGateway
hh3cOnuIpAddressGateway.description: The gateway of IP address denoted by hh3cOnuIpAddress.

hh3cOnuDhcpallocate.name: hh3cOnuDhcpallocate
hh3cOnuDhcpallocate.description: true(1) - ONU auto allocate IP address status enable. false(2) - ONU auto allocate IP address status disable.

hh3cOnuManageVID.name: hh3cOnuManageVID
hh3cOnuManageVID.description: The management VLAN of ONU denoted by hh3cOnuManageVID.

hh3cOnuManageVlanIntfS.name: hh3cOnuManageVlanIntfS
hh3cOnuManageVlanIntfS.description: The management interface status of ONU denoted by hh3cOnuManageVlanIntfS.

hh3cOnuChipSetInfoTable.name: hh3cOnuChipSetInfoTable
hh3cOnuChipSetInfoTable.description: ONU vendor specific information of ONU.

hh3cOnuChipSetVendorId.name: hh3cOnuChipSetVendorId
hh3cOnuChipSetVendorId.description: Chipset vendor ID, which identifies the ONU's PON chip vendor according JEDEC ID code.

hh3cOnuChipSetModel.name: hh3cOnuChipSetModel
hh3cOnuChipSetModel.description: Chip model, numbering(range from 0 to 0xFF) by the chip vendor.

hh3cOnuCapabilityEntry.name: hh3cOnuCapabilityEntry
hh3cOnuCapabilityEntry.description: The entry of the table hh3cOnuCapabilityTable.

hh3cOnuServiceSupported.name: hh3cOnuServiceSupported
hh3cOnuServiceSupported.description: Services types supported by the ONU. These functional groups can be supported independently. geinterfacesupport - supporting (1)/not supporting(0) Gbit Ethernet GE interface. feinterfacesupport - supporting (1)/not supporting(0) 100M Ethernet FE interface.(maximum rate is 100M, without GEinterface) voipservicesupport - supporting (1)/not supporting(0)VoIP service. tdmservicesupport - supporting (1)/not supporting(0)TDM CES service.

hh3cOnuGEPortNumber.name: hh3cOnuGEPortNumber
hh3cOnuGEPortNumber.description: The current gigabit ethernet ports number supported by the ONU.

hh3cOnuFEPortNumber.name: hh3cOnuFEPortNumber
hh3cOnuFEPortNumber.description: the current fast ethernet ports number supported by the ONU.

hh3cOnuPOTSPortNumber.name: hh3cOnuPOTSPortNumber
hh3cOnuPOTSPortNumber.description: The current POTS ports number supported by the ONU

hh3cOnuE1PortsNumber.name: hh3cOnuE1PortsNumber
hh3cOnuE1PortsNumber.description: The current E1 ports number supported by the ONU.

hh3cOnuUpstreamQueueNumber.name: hh3cOnuUpstreamQueueNumber
hh3cOnuUpstreamQueueNumber.description: The number of upstream queues supported by the ONU.

hh3cOnuIgspFastLeaveSupported.name: hh3cOnuIgspFastLeaveSupported
hh3cOnuIgspFastLeaveSupported.description: true(1) - ONU supports fast leave in igsp mode. false(2) - ONU does not support fast leave in igsp mode.

hh3cOnuMCtrlFastLeaveSupported.name: hh3cOnuMCtrlFastLeaveSupported
hh3cOnuMCtrlFastLeaveSupported.description: true(1) - ONU supports fast leave in multicast control mode. false(2) - ONU does not support fast leave in multicast control mode.

hh3cOnuDbaReportTable.name: hh3cOnuDbaReportTable
hh3cOnuDbaReportTable.description: This table defines the information of DBA(dynamic bandwidth allocation) report threshold contained in the MPCP report frames.

hh3cOnuDbaReportEntry.description: The entry of the table hh3cOnuDbaReportTable.

hh3cOnuDbaReportThreshold.description: The threshold of the DBA report queue. the following is the queue ID and the related default threshold setting. 1 - 0 2 - 0 3 - 0 4 - 65535 5 - 65535 6 - 0 7 - 0 8 - 0

hh3cOnuDbaReportStatus.name: hh3cOnuDbaReportStatus
hh3cOnuDbaReportStatus.description: enable -threshold configuration is active for the queue. disable -threshold configuration is not active for the queue.

hh3cOnuCosToLocalPrecedenceTable.name: hh3cOnuCosToLocalPrecedenceTable
hh3cOnuCosToLocalPrecedenceTable.description: Table of map of the COS to local-precedence.

hh3cOnuCosToLocalPrecedenceEntry.description: Configuration information of map of the COS to local precedence.

hh3cOnuCosToLocalPrecedenceCosIndex.name: hh3cOnuCosToLocalPrecedenceCosIndex
hh3cOnuCosToLocalPrecedenceCosIndex.description: Index of the map, obtains from packet cos value.

hh3cEponOnuStpPortEntry.name: hh3cEponOnuStpPortEntry
hh3cEponOnuStpPortEntry.description: Configuration information of ONU STP ports.

hh3cEponStpPortIndex.name: hh3cEponStpPortIndex
hh3cEponStpPortIndex.description: The index of the STP ports.

hh3cEponStpPortDescr.name: hh3cEponStpPortDescr
hh3cEponStpPortDescr.description: The description of the STP ports.

hh3cEponStpPortState.name: hh3cEponStpPortState
hh3cEponStpPortState.description: The current state of the port (i.e. disabled, discarding, learning and forwarding).

hh3cOnuPhysicalTable.name: hh3cOnuPhysicalTable
hh3cOnuPhysicalTable.description: This table is used for getting ONU physical information.

hh3cOnuBridgeMac.name: hh3cOnuBridgeMac
hh3cOnuBridgeMac.description: The bridge MAC address of ONU.

hh3cOnuFirstPonMac.name: hh3cOnuFirstPonMac
hh3cOnuFirstPonMac.description: The MAC address of ONU first PON port.

hh3cOnuFirstPonRegState.name: hh3cOnuFirstPonRegState
hh3cOnuFirstPonRegState.description: The register state of ONU first PON port.

hh3cOnuSecondPonMac.name: hh3cOnuSecondPonMac
hh3cOnuSecondPonMac.description: The MAC address of ONU second PON port.

hh3cOnuSecondPonRegState.name: hh3cOnuSecondPonRegState
hh3cOnuSecondPonRegState.description: The register state of ONU second PON port.

hh3cOnuSmlkTable.name: hh3cOnuSmlkTable
hh3cOnuSmlkTable.description: This table is used for getting ONU SMLK information.

hh3cOnuSmlkGroupID.description: The SMLK group ID of ONU.

hh3cOnuSmlkFirstPonRole.description: The role of ONU first PON port in a SMLK group.

hh3cOnuSmlkFirstPonStatus.name: hh3cOnuSmlkFirstPonStatus
hh3cOnuSmlkFirstPonStatus.description: The transmitting status of ONU first PON port in a SMLK group.

hh3cOnuSmlkSecondPonRole.name: hh3cOnuSmlkSecondPonRole
hh3cOnuSmlkSecondPonRole.description: The role of ONU second PON port in a SMLK group.

hh3cOnuSmlkSecondPonStatus.name: hh3cOnuSmlkSecondPonStatus
hh3cOnuSmlkSecondPonStatus.description: The transmitting status of ONU second PON port in a SMLK group.

hh3cOnuRS485DataBits.name: hh3cOnuRS485DataBits
hh3cOnuRS485DataBits.description: The port number of data bits in a character.

hh3cOnuRS485Parity.name: hh3cOnuRS485Parity
hh3cOnuRS485Parity.description: The port sense of a character parity bit.

hh3cOnuRS485StopBits.name: hh3cOnuRS485StopBits
hh3cOnuRS485StopBits.description: The port number of stop bits.

hh3cOnuRS485FlowControl.name: hh3cOnuRS485FlowControl
hh3cOnuRS485FlowControl.description: The port type of input flow control. 'none' indicates no flow control at this level. 'hardware' indicates using hardware signals. 'xonOrxoff' indicates using software function.

hh3cOnuRS485TXOctets.name: hh3cOnuRS485TXOctets
hh3cOnuRS485TXOctets.description: The number of output octets about the port. The unit is byte.

hh3cOnuRS485RXOctets.name: hh3cOnuRS485RXOctets
hh3cOnuRS485RXOctets.description: The number of input octets about the port. The unit is byte.

hh3cOnuRS485TXErrOctets.name: hh3cOnuRS485TXErrOctets
hh3cOnuRS485TXErrOctets.description: The number of output error octets about the port. The unit is byte.

hh3cOnuRS485RXErrOctets.name: hh3cOnuRS485RXErrOctets
hh3cOnuRS485RXErrOctets.description: The number of input error octets about the port. The unit is byte.

hh3cOnuRS485ResetStatistics.name: hh3cOnuRS485ResetStatistics
hh3cOnuRS485ResetStatistics.description: Reset the counters to zero, including hh3cOnuRS485TXOctets, hh3cOnuRS485RXOctets, hh3cOnuRS485TXErrOctets and hh3cOnuRS485RXErrOctets.

hh3cOnuRS485SessionSummaryEntry.name: hh3cOnuRS485SessionSummaryEntry
hh3cOnuRS485SessionSummaryEntry.description: The entry of session summary table.

hh3cOnuRS485SessionMaxNum.name: hh3cOnuRS485SessionMaxNum
hh3cOnuRS485SessionMaxNum.description: The max session number of every serial port which can be supported.

hh3cOnuRS485SessionNextIndex.name: hh3cOnuRS485SessionNextIndex
hh3cOnuRS485SessionNextIndex.description: The next valid index used for creating a new session raw. When there is no valid index left, it will return 0.

hh3cOnuRS485SessionTable.name: hh3cOnuRS485SessionTable
hh3cOnuRS485SessionTable.description: RS485 raw session table. Data received from RS485 will be sent to the destination by raw sockets.

hh3cOnuRS485SessionType.name: hh3cOnuRS485SessionType
hh3cOnuRS485SessionType.description: The type of a session. A session can use UDP socket, TCP socket as a client, or TCP socket as a server.

hh3cOnuRS485SessionAddType.name: hh3cOnuRS485SessionAddType
hh3cOnuRS485SessionAddType.description: This object indicates the transport type of the address contained in hh3cOnuRS485SessionRemoteIP object.

hh3cOnuRS485SessionRemoteIP.name: hh3cOnuRS485SessionRemoteIP
hh3cOnuRS485SessionRemoteIP.description: The IP of remote landing. When session type is 'udp', this is the peer IP. When session type is 'tcpClient', this is the server IP. When session type is 'tcpServer', this is invalid.

hh3cOnuRS485SessionRemotePort.name: hh3cOnuRS485SessionRemotePort
hh3cOnuRS485SessionRemotePort.description: The port of remote landing. When session type is 'udp', this is the peer port. When session type is 'tcpClient', this is the server port. When session type is 'tcpServer', this is invalid.

hh3cOnuRS485SessionLocalPort.name: hh3cOnuRS485SessionLocalPort
hh3cOnuRS485SessionLocalPort.description: Local socket port. When session type is 'udp', this is local UDP socket port. When session type is 'tcpClient', this is invalid. When session type is 'tcpServer', this is the local port which will be listened.

hh3cOnuRS485SessionRowStatus.name: hh3cOnuRS485SessionRowStatus
hh3cOnuRS485SessionRowStatus.description: The status used for creating, modifying, and deleting instances of the columnar objects in raw session table.

hh3cOnuRS485SessionErrInfoTable.name: hh3cOnuRS485SessionErrInfoTable
hh3cOnuRS485SessionErrInfoTable.description: Error information table. When failed to create a session, error information can be got from this table.

hh3cOnuRS485SessionErrInfoEntry.name: hh3cOnuRS485SessionErrInfoEntry
hh3cOnuRS485SessionErrInfoEntry.description: The entry of error information table.

hh3cOnuRS485SessionErrInfo.name: hh3cOnuRS485SessionErrInfo
hh3cOnuRS485SessionErrInfo.description: Error information string. When a response with 'noCreeation' for row creation in table hh3cOnuRS485SessionTable, the error reason can be got from this object.

hh3cEponBatchOperationBySlotTable.name: hh3cEponBatchOperationBySlotTable
hh3cEponBatchOperationBySlotTable.description: This table is used for batch operation by slot.

hh3cEponBatchOperationBySlotType.name: hh3cEponBatchOperationBySlotType
hh3cEponBatchOperationBySlotType.description: The types of batch operation by slot: 1 - resetUnknown, the object value is not set. 9 - updateDba, update OLT DBA algorithm. Config the MIB object module hh3cEponDbaUpdateFileName. 10 - updateONU, update ONU firmware. Config the MIB object module hh3cEponOnuUpdateFileName with the filename of ONU firmware first.

hh3cEponBatchOperationBySlotResult.name: hh3cEponBatchOperationBySlotResult
hh3cEponBatchOperationBySlotResult.description: The result of batch operation. 0xFFFF - other, general error. 1 - working, operation is not completed. 2 - successful, completed successfully. 3 - failed because the DBA source file does not exist. 4 - failed because the ONU firmware file does not exist. 5 - failed because of not set the filename of DBA source. 6 - failed because of not set the filename of ONU firmware. 7 - failed because of not set slottype.

hh3cEponBatchOperationByOLTTable.name: hh3cEponBatchOperationByOLTTable
hh3cEponBatchOperationByOLTTable.description: This table is used for batch operation by OLT.

hh3cEponBatchOperationByOLTType.name: hh3cEponBatchOperationByOLTType
hh3cEponBatchOperationByOLTType.description: The types of batch operation by OLT(operation for all ONUs in the OLT): 1 -- resetUnknown, the object value is not set. 5 -- updateONU, update ONU firmware. configure the MIB object module hh3cEponOnuUpdateFileName with the filename of ONU firmware first.

hh3cEponBatchOperationByOLTResult.name: hh3cEponBatchOperationByOLTResult
hh3cEponBatchOperationByOLTResult.description: The result of batch operation: 0xFFFF -- other, gernal error. 1 -- working, operation is not completed. 2 -- successful, operation completed successfully. 4 -- failed because the ONU firmware file does not exist. 6 -- failed because of not set the filename of ONU firmware. 7 -- failed because of not set olttype.

hh3cOnuFirmwareUpdateByTypeTable.name: hh3cOnuFirmwareUpdateByTypeTable
hh3cOnuFirmwareUpdateByTypeTable.description: This table is used to update ONU by ONU type.

hh3cOnuUpdateByOnuTypeIndex.name: hh3cOnuUpdateByOnuTypeIndex
hh3cOnuUpdateByOnuTypeIndex.description: The type and file relationship table entry index.

hh3cOnuUpdateByTypeFileName.name: hh3cOnuUpdateByTypeFileName
hh3cOnuUpdateByTypeFileName.description: The file to be updated for the type of ONUs.

hh3cOnuUpdateByTypeRowStatus.name: hh3cOnuUpdateByTypeRowStatus
hh3cOnuUpdateByTypeRowStatus.description: The status of this table entry. Only createAndGo and destroy actions are supported.

hh3cEponOnuRegErrorMacAddr.name: hh3cEponOnuRegErrorMacAddr
hh3cEponOnuRegErrorMacAddr.description: The MAC of ONU registered error.

hh3cOamEventLogType.name: hh3cOamEventLogType
hh3cOamEventLogType.description: The type of event that generated this entry in the event log.

hh3cOamEventLogLocation.name: hh3cOamEventLogLocation
hh3cOamEventLogLocation.description: Whether this event occurred locally, or was received from the OAM peer via Ethernet OAM.

hh3cEponLoopbackPortIndex.name: hh3cEponLoopbackPortIndex
hh3cEponLoopbackPortIndex.description: The index of port which generate loop back event.

hh3cEponLoopbackPortDescr.name: hh3cEponLoopbackPortDescr
hh3cEponLoopbackPortDescr.description: A textual string containing information about the port generated loop back event.

hh3cOltPortAlarmLlidMisFrames.name: hh3cOltPortAlarmLlidMisFrames

hh3cEponPortAlarmBerTrap.name: hh3cEponPortAlarmBerTrap
hh3cEponPortAlarmBerTrap.description: A hh3cEponPortAlarmBerTrap notification is sent when a BER threshold crossing event is detected.

hh3cEponPortAlarmFerTrap.name: hh3cEponPortAlarmFerTrap
hh3cEponPortAlarmFerTrap.description: A hh3cEponPortAlarmFerTrap notification is sent when a frame error rate threshold crossing event is detected.

hh3cEponErrorLLIDFrameTrap.name: hh3cEponErrorLLIDFrameTrap
hh3cEponErrorLLIDFrameTrap.description: A hh3cEponErrorLLIDFrameTrap notification is sent when a LLID mismatched frames rate threshold crossing event is detected.

hh3cEponLoopBackEnableTrap.name: hh3cEponLoopBackEnableTrap
hh3cEponLoopBackEnableTrap.description: A hh3cEponLoopBackEnableTrap notification is sent when the loop back command is committed.

hh3cEponOnuRegistrationErrTrap.name: hh3cEponOnuRegistrationErrTrap
hh3cEponOnuRegistrationErrTrap.description: A hh3cEponOnuRegistrationErrTrap notification is sent when a ONU register failed.

hh3cEponOamDisconnectionTrap.name: hh3cEponOamDisconnectionTrap
hh3cEponOamDisconnectionTrap.description: A hh3cEponOamDisconnectionTrap notification is sent when LLID's OAM link is disconnected.

hh3cEponEncryptionKeyErrTrap.name: hh3cEponEncryptionKeyErrTrap
hh3cEponEncryptionKeyErrTrap.description: A hh3cEponEncryptionKeyErrTrap notification is sent when LLID's encryption key is bad.

hh3cEponRemoteStableTrap.name: hh3cEponRemoteStableTrap
hh3cEponRemoteStableTrap.description: A hh3cEponRemoteStableTrap notification is sent when remote Data Terminal Equipment(DTE) has not seen or is unsatisfied with local state information.

hh3cEponLocalStableTrap.name: hh3cEponLocalStableTrap
hh3cEponLocalStableTrap.description: A hh3cEponLocalStableTrap notification is sent when DTE has not seen or is unsatisfied with remote state information.

hh3cEponOamVendorSpecificTrap.name: hh3cEponOamVendorSpecificTrap
hh3cEponOamVendorSpecificTrap.description: A hh3cEponOamVendorSpecificTrap notification is sent when system vendor specific OAM alarm raised.

hh3cEponSoftwareErrTrap.name: hh3cEponSoftwareErrTrap
hh3cEponSoftwareErrTrap.description: A hh3cEponSoftwareErrTrap notification is sent when a PAS-SOFT internal error occurs.

hh3cEponPortAlarmBerRecoverTrap.name: hh3cEponPortAlarmBerRecoverTrap
hh3cEponPortAlarmBerRecoverTrap.description: A hh3cEponPortAlarmBerRecoverTrap notification is sent when a BER threshold crossing event is detected and then recovered.

hh3cEponPortAlarmFerRecoverTrap.name: hh3cEponPortAlarmFerRecoverTrap
hh3cEponPortAlarmFerRecoverTrap.description: A hh3cEponPortAlarmFerRecoverTrap notification is sent when a frame error rate threshold crossing event is detected and then recoverd.

hh3cEponErrorLLIDFrameRecoverTrap.name: hh3cEponErrorLLIDFrameRecoverTrap
hh3cEponErrorLLIDFrameRecoverTrap.description: A hh3cEponErrorLLIDFrameRecoverTrap notification is sent when a LLID mismatched frames rate threshold crossing event is detected and then recoverd.

hh3cEponLoopBackEnableRecoverTrap.name: hh3cEponLoopBackEnableRecoverTrap
hh3cEponLoopBackEnableRecoverTrap.description: A hh3cEponLoopBackEnableRecoverTrap notification is sent when the loop back is detected and then recoverd.

hh3cEponOnuRegistrationErrRecoverTrap.name: hh3cEponOnuRegistrationErrRecoverTrap
hh3cEponOnuRegistrationErrRecoverTrap.description: A hh3cEponOnuRegistrationErrRecoverTrap notification is sent when an ONU register failed and then register successful again.

hh3cEponOamDisconnectionRecoverTrap.name: hh3cEponOamDisconnectionRecoverTrap
hh3cEponOamDisconnectionRecoverTrap.description: A hh3cEponOamDisconnectionRecoverTrap notification is sent when LLID's OAM link is disconnected and then connected.

hh3cEponEncryptionKeyErrRecoverTrap.name: hh3cEponEncryptionKeyErrRecoverTrap
hh3cEponEncryptionKeyErrRecoverTrap.description: A hh3cEponEncryptionKeyErrRecoverTrap notification is sent when LLID's encryption key is bad and then right.

hh3cEponRemoteStableRecoverTrap.name: hh3cEponRemoteStableRecoverTrap
hh3cEponRemoteStableRecoverTrap.description: A hh3cEponRemoteStableRecoverTrap notification is sent when remote DTE has not seen or is unsatisfied with local state information and then is realized.

hh3cEponLocalStableRecoverTrap.name: hh3cEponLocalStableRecoverTrap
hh3cEponLocalStableRecoverTrap.description: A hh3cEponLocalStableRecoverTrap notification is sent when DTE has not seen or is unsatisfied with remote state information and then is realized.

hh3cEponOamVendorSpecificRecoverTrap.name: hh3cEponOamVendorSpecificRecoverTrap
hh3cEponOamVendorSpecificRecoverTrap.description: A hh3cEponOamVendorSpecificRecoverTrap notification is sent when system vendor specific OAM alarm is detected and then recovered.

hh3cEponSoftwareErrRecoverTrap.name: hh3cEponSoftwareErrRecoverTrap
hh3cEponSoftwareErrRecoverTrap.description: A hh3cEponSoftwareErrRecoverTrap notification is sent when a PAS-SOFT internal error is detected and then recovered.

hh3cDot3OamThresholdRecoverEvent.name: hh3cDot3OamThresholdRecoverEvent
hh3cDot3OamThresholdRecoverEvent.description: A hh3cDot3OamThresholdRecoverEvent notification is sent when hh3cDot3OamThresholdEvent is detected and then recoverd.

hh3cDot3OamNonThresholdRecoverEvent.name: hh3cDot3OamNonThresholdRecoverEvent
hh3cDot3OamNonThresholdRecoverEvent.description: A hh3cDot3OamNonThresholdRecoverEvent notification is sent when hh3cDot3OamNonThresholdEvent is detected and then recoverd.

hh3cEponOnuRegExcessTrap.name: hh3cEponOnuRegExcessTrap
hh3cEponOnuRegExcessTrap.description: A hh3cEponOnuRegExcessTrap notification is sent when the number of registered ONUs exceeds the limit.

hh3cEponOnuRegExcessRecoverTrap.name: hh3cEponOnuRegExcessRecoverTrap
hh3cEponOnuRegExcessRecoverTrap.description: A hh3cEponOnuRegExcessRecoverTrap notification is sent when hh3cEponOnuRegExcessTrap is detected and then recoverd.

hh3cEponOnuPowerOffTrap.name: hh3cEponOnuPowerOffTrap
hh3cEponOnuPowerOffTrap.description: A hh3cEponOnuPowerOffTrap notification is sent when ONU is power off.

hh3cEponOltSwitchoverTrap.name: hh3cEponOltSwitchoverTrap
hh3cEponOltSwitchoverTrap.description: A hh3cEponOltSwithoverTrap notification is sent when OLT switchover is detected.

hh3cEponOltDFETrap.name: hh3cEponOltDFETrap
hh3cEponOltDFETrap.description: A hh3cEponOltDFETrap notification is sent when there was a serious problem(device fatal error) on OLT.

hh3cEponOltDFERecoverTrap.name: hh3cEponOltDFERecoverTrap
hh3cEponOltDFERecoverTrap.description: A hh3cEponOltDFERecoverTrap notification is sent when device fatal error is detected and then recoverd.

hh3cEponOnuSilenceTrap.name: hh3cEponOnuSilenceTrap
hh3cEponOnuSilenceTrap.description: The hh3cEponOnuSilenceTrap notification is sent when an unbound ONU try to register to an OLT.

hh3cEponOnuSilenceRecoverTrap.name: hh3cEponOnuSilenceRecoverTrap
hh3cEponOnuSilenceRecoverTrap.description: The hh3cEponOnuSilenceRecoverTrap notification is sent when a silent ONU is bound in the OLT or the aging onu mac address is timeout.

hh3cEponOnuUpdateResultTrap.name: hh3cEponOnuUpdateResultTrap
hh3cEponOnuUpdateResultTrap.description: A hh3cEponUpdateResultTrap notification is sent when an ONU reported its firmware update result.

hh3cEponOnuAutoBindTrap.name: hh3cEponOnuAutoBindTrap
hh3cEponOnuAutoBindTrap.description: A hh3cEponOnuAutoBindTrap notification is sent when a silent ONU is bound automatically.

hh3cEponOnuPortStpStateTrap.name: hh3cEponOnuPortStpStateTrap
hh3cEponOnuPortStpStateTrap.description: A hh3cEponOnuPortStpStateTrap notification is sent when a port turns into another state in STP environment.

hh3cEponOnuLaserFailedTrap.name: hh3cEponOnuLaserFailedTrap
hh3cEponOnuLaserFailedTrap.description: A hh3cEponOnuLaserFailedTrap notification is sent when an ONU has trouble with laser, such as laser constantly turned on, signal degradation or optics EOL (End of Life).

hh3cOnuSmlkSwitchoverTrap.name: hh3cOnuSmlkSwitchoverTrap
hh3cOnuSmlkSwitchoverTrap.description: A hh3cOnuSmlkSwitchoverTrap notification is sent when an ONU SMLK switchover is detected.

hh3cEponStatTable.name: hh3cEponStatTable
hh3cEponStatTable.description: This table contains line code error statistics of epon port.

hh3cEponStatFER.name: hh3cEponStatFER
hh3cEponStatFER.description: The frame error rate of epon port, measured in 1e-9 unit.

hh3cEponStatBER.name: hh3cEponStatBER
hh3cEponStatBER.description: The bit error rate of epon port, measured in 1e-9 unit.
